title: fridays
content:
This is too perfect--The Pragmatic Programmers are publishing short, cheap PDF e-books focused on small topics. While the first book is not too exciting for me (I'm a GTK man myself), the next releases mentioned are all areas I'm very interested in. Kudos to the Pragmatic Programmers for breaking the rules of publishing again.

Oh yeah, and it's funny that the tenative cover for a book on QT programming looks suspiciously like the GNOME logo.
